prompt: Create an investor pitch deck for a SaaS company called CloudSync. We're a B2B file synchronization platform for enterprises, raising our Seed round of $3M at a $10M pre-money valuation. We have 50 paying customers, $500K ARR, and growing 30% month-over-month. The team includes our CEO (former Dropbox PM) and CTO (ex-Google infrastructure). Market size is $15B TAM. Use blue (#0066CC) as our primary brand color.
expectations: Deck contains 12-15 slides
Every slide has a visual element (no text-only slides)
Financial projections show revenue growth
Team slide includes founders' backgrounds
Uses blue color (#0066CC) as primary brand accent
Includes clear ask on final slide ($3M Seed round)
Market opportunity slide shows $15B TAM
Traction slide mentions 50 customers and $500K ARR

prompt: I need a pitch deck for our climate tech startup, GreenGrid. We're building AI-powered energy optimization for commercial buildings. Raising Series A of $8M at $30M pre-money. Currently deployed in 200 buildings, saving average 23% on energy costs. Team of 15, founded by energy sector veterans. Use green (#00A86B) as primary color. TAM is $50B.
expectations: Problem slide addresses energy inefficiency in commercial buildings
Solution slide explains AI-powered optimization approach
Traction slide shows 200 buildings deployed and 23% savings metric
Uses green (#00A86B) as brand color
Series A ask of $8M is clearly stated
Market opportunity shows $50B TAM
Team slide highlights energy sector expertise
Deck follows professional visual design standards

prompt: Build a pitch deck for BioSynth, a biotech company developing novel protein therapeutics. Pre-seed round, raising $2M at $6M pre-money valuation. We have preliminary lab results showing 40% improvement over existing treatments. Founded by PhD researchers from MIT. Market is rare genetic disorders, $8B TAM. Use purple (#7B2CBF) as primary color.
expectations: Deck is appropriate for Pre-seed stage (acknowledges early stage)
Scientific credibility established through MIT background
Preliminary results (40% improvement) highlighted in traction
Uses purple (#7B2CBF) as brand accent
Ask is $2M at $6M pre-money
Market slide shows rare genetic disorders and $8B TAM
Product/technology slide explains therapeutic approach
Professional biotech-appropriate design
